message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I've thought about it, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm thinking of a price of $105
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in the game, Bob! I'm willing to budge a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not giving away too much. I'm thinking of a price of $110
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $105 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I still think I can do better. I'm thinking of a price of $115
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think $115 is a fair price for this product, considering its value to you. I'm sticking with my previous offer
